abstract: Samuel A. Di Piazza Jr., a former chief executive of the accounting firm PricewaterhouseCoopers, will be a vice chairman in the bank’s institutional clients group.

lead_paragraph: Samuel A. Di Piazza Jr., a former chief executive of the accounting firm PricewaterhouseCoopers, is joining Citigroup as a vice chairman in the institutional clients group.
